title: Outlook Plugin development exe
description:
Objective
Prevent users to open all attachments and hyperlinks in the email body from MS-Outlook received from unwanted senders who is not in the specified Whitelist (containing domains) or is in the mentioned Blacklist (containing emails).
Whitelist: Contains all allowed domains that are allowed
Blacklist: Contains all emails (within the Whitelist) that should be blocked.
Requirements
Plug-in should be Microsoft Office 365 compatible.
MS-Access Database to be used instead of SQL Server. Two separate tables – one table for Whitelist Domains and another table for Blacklist Emails.
The plug-in should function as desired without internet connection.
A “Refresh” option required to refresh the local cache from the database.
Network database path can be changed dynamically. No further installations be required in case of change in path.
The Plug-in must not hamper the normal operational efficiency of MS-Outlook.
The plug-in must not conflict with any other Endpoint solutions like – Symantc, TrendMicro, Sentinel, etc.
Platform
Language : C#
Database : MS-Access
Note : Any third party components cannot be used other than Microsoft.
Operation
The plugin fetches the Whitelist and Blacklist while Outlook is launched. The list is stored in local cache. If database cannot be reached, an alert should be raised to the user and plug-in should continue to function normally with the last known Domain Whitelist and Email Blacklist.
If database is reachable, the local cache list will be auto-refreshed hourly.
When user clicks any received email, the plug-in should raise an alert if the sender of the mail does not belong to the Whitelist or belong to the Blacklist.
No action to be taken if the sender of the email is validated.
If the sender is not in the Whitelist or in the Blacklist, then the user cannot open any attached document and hyperlink in that particular email.
